channel.title: Teleportation symbols....change tele location...how?
channel.description:
I'm wondering how to change the like tele to watch tower so i can set it so that if you click it you will be teled to where you set it too.[br][size=1]Posted at: October 11, 2006, 09:03:22 PM[/size][hr]hello?
im also wondering how to change your characters hair.

item.title: Teleportation symbols....change tele location...how?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

If you look in client.java, search for this:

checkwildy();

Then underneath it is shows this:

[code]{
if (s == “Varrock”)
{
teleportToX = 3210;
teleportToY = 3424;
addSkillXP((125*playerLevel[6]), 6);
heightLevel = 0;
actionTimer = 10;
}

 if (s == "Falador")
 {
    teleportToX = 2964;
    teleportToY = 3378;
    addSkillXP((250*playerLevel[6]), 6);
    heightLevel = 0;
         
 }

 if (s == "Lumby")
 {
    teleportToX = 3222;
    teleportToY = 3218;
    addSkillXP((500*playerLevel[6]), 6);
    heightLevel = 0;
 }

 if (s == "Camelot")
 {
    teleportToX = 2757;
    teleportToY = 3477;
   addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[6]), 6);
    heightLevel = 0;
 }

 if (s == "Ardougne")
 {
    teleportToX = 2662;
    teleportToY = 3305;
    addSkillXP((2000*playerLevel[6]), 6);
    heightLevel = 0;
    
 }

 if (s == "Watchtower")
 {
    teleportToX = 2549;
    teleportToY = 3113;
    addSkillXP((3000*playerLevel[6]), 6);
    heightLevel = 0;
    
 }

 if (s == "Trollheim")
 {
    teleportToX = 3091;
    teleportToY = 3963;
    addSkillXP((4000*playerLevel[6]), 6);
    heightLevel = 0;
 }

 if (s == "Ape")
 {
    teleportToX = 2795;
    teleportToY = 2799;
    addSkillXP((4000*playerLevel[6]), 6);
    heightLevel = 1;
 }

}[/code]

Chnage the X and Y to the cords of where you want to go to chnage actual teleports.

Read full topic

item.title: Teleportation symbols....change tele location...how?
item.dc:creator: @koed_noob koed noob
item.description:
@koed_noob wrote:

uhh…
i think i can help u

make a command like wat ever it is for example…jus copy and paste this
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“where ever u want to tele to”))
if(absY >= 3672)
{
sendMessage(“You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness.”);
}
else
{
teleportToX = cords for that place;
teleportToY = cords for that place;
sendMessage(“wat ever u want it to say when u get there”);
sendMessage(“same thing”);
}
put this in clint.java with ur other tele commands
